subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: American Samoa had lost all 30 international men’s soccer matches it had played, outscored by 229-12, before defeating Tonga, 2-1, in a prequalifying match for the 2014 World Cup.
snippet: American Samoa had lost all 30 international men’s soccer matches it had played, outscored by 229-12, before defeating Tonga, 2-1, in a prequalifying match for the 2014 World Cup.
